slides.title: Maintenance Copilot Guides Technicians to Fix Machines Faster
slides.description: Floor techs ask an AI on their tablet, which pulls the right step‑by‑step fix from manuals and past tickets—cutting downtime and locking expert know‑how in software.
slides.image_prompt: Comic-style scene: A factory technician in a hardhat faces a large machine with an error alarm. The technician holds a tablet showing a friendly AI assistant avatar pointing at a highlighted machine diagram with a specific part circled. A broken gear icon hovers over the machine, and a clock with a checkmark indicates a quick fix. Bright arrows connect the AI on the tablet to the machine, emphasising instant guidance and reduced downtime.

slides.title: LLM‑Demand Planner Improves Forecasts and Inventory
slides.description: An AI reads sales, promos and weather to sharpen demand plans, letting planners test ‘what‑if’ scenarios in minutes and slash stock‑outs and write‑offs.
slides.image_prompt: Comic-style split scene: On the left, a supply planner is surrounded by empty store shelves (stockouts) and an overflowing warehouse of boxes (overstock), looking stressed with chaotic charts in hand. On the right, the same planner smiles at a laptop where an AI assistant displays a neat forecast graph and a balanced inventory plan. Weather icons and market trend arrows swirl into the AI’s graph, showing it factoring external data. Use bright arrows from the left chaos to the right optimized chart to highlight the improvement.

slides.title: AI Control Tower Flags Delays and Suggests Fixes in Real Time
slides.description: The LLM watches live feeds—traffic, weather, ports—and warns supply‑chain teams of at‑risk orders, offering reroutes or backup suppliers before delays hit.
slides.image_prompt: Comic-style control room: Managers watch a world map with shipping routes on a big screen. A friendly AI avatar on the screen points at a hurricane icon over a port on the map. In speech bubble: “Storm may delay Asia shipments—rerouting suggested.” One manager’s tablet shows an alert list of at-risk orders with red warning symbols. Curved arrows on the map illustrate an alternate route around the storm. Use bright red exclamation icons and arrows to show the AI proactively warning and re-planning routes.

slides.title: Procurement Copilot Reviews Contracts and Flags Supplier Risk
slides.description: The AI skims contracts, emails and news, highlighting risky clauses or troubled suppliers so buyers fix issues fast and cut admin hours.
slides.image_prompt: Comic panel: left a frazzled procurement manager buried in contracts. Right the manager smiles as AI highlights a risky clause with a red flag and shows a news alert about the supplier.

slides.title: Document Agent Turns Freight Paperwork into Clean Data
slides.description: LLM tools read invoices, customs forms and bills of lading, push clean fields into ERP in seconds, speeding shipments and killing key‑in errors.
slides.image_prompt: Comic frame: Shipping documents fly into a scanner; an AI robot hands a tablet showing structured data. A calendar with a lightning bolt shows faster processing.

slides.title: Industrial Code Assistant Generates and Debugs PLC Scripts
slides.description: Engineers describe the task in plain English; the AI writes or fixes automation code in minutes, accelerating line changeovers and closing the skills gap.
slides.image_prompt: Comic scene: Engineer asks an AI hologram for robot code; AI shows generated PLC script, robot instantly sorts parts. A crossed‑out “2 weeks of coding” scroll highlights the time saved.

slides.title: AI Knowledge Base Keeps Expert Know‑How After Retirement
slides.description: Manuals and veteran interviews feed an LLM, giving rookies instant answers like “Calibrate press for Alloy Y” and slashing ramp‑up time.
slides.image_prompt: Comic: Retiring expert’s knowledge flows into an AI book; a young engineer asks the AI and gets a step list. A bridge icon links the two.

slides.title: Voice Assistant Helps Drivers and Warehouse Staff Hands‑Free
slides.description: Drivers ask the AI for route updates; pickers query inventory by voice. Real‑time answers, no phone calls, safer and quicker ops.
slides.image_prompt: Comic: Truck driver with headset asks about delays; AI on GPS shows reroute. Nearby, warehouse picker gets aisle info via earpiece.

slides.title: 24/7 After‑Sales Bot Troubleshoots Customer Machines
slides.description: Customers chat with an AI that walks them through fixes or books service visits, boosting first‑contact resolution and CSAT.
slides.image_prompt: Comic: Customer messages AI about leaking washer at 2 AM; AI lists fix steps and a "Book Service" button.

slides.title: Review Analyzer Surfaces Top Customer Issues in Minutes
slides.description: LLM scans reviews and tickets, summarises top complaints and liked features so product teams act faster on real feedback.
slides.image_prompt: Comic: Overwhelmed manager buried in feedback vs AI robot showing neat chart of top 3 issues and wins.

slides.title: Adaptive Scheduler Replans Factory Jobs When Things Change
slides.description: When a machine fails or a rush order arrives, the AI instantly reshuffles the schedule to keep throughput high and delivery on time.
slides.image_prompt: Comic: A machine with "Maintenance" sign; AI arm moves task cards on an electronic schedule board, other lines keep running.
